meanings.definition: A list or plan of things to be done or considered
meanings.sent1: She always writes down her agendas in a notebook.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had a detailed agenda for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: His agenda was so long, it looked like a scroll!
meanings.sent4: The agenda of the day unfolded like a story with many chapters.
meanings.sent5: The colorful agenda on the board caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A set of goals or objectives
meanings.sent1: Their agendas for the project were clear and achievable.
meanings.sent2: The company's agenda focused on sustainability and growth.
meanings.sent3: His agenda to eat all the cookies was foiled by his sister.
meanings.sent4: The agenda of becoming a better person drove her every day.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious agenda inspired others to dream big.
